entry.title: Spet.28
entry.content: Actually I really want to write a article,but I read too little, I think I can’t do it well. :(

entry.title: sept.27
entry.content:
I got a fantastic day!

  • in the morning, I was invited to a lecture about the postgraduate exam…I knew how to arrange my study plan if I decide to join the postgraduate examfrom the lecture…now I try hard to find a major which i'am interested..then I go with my roommate to “beer festivel” in her Engish-learning institution.it’s funny.a foreign teacher is so cute when he modelled himself on drunkenness.and all people is full of lovely.my vocabulary limited,that’s all.

entry.title: Spet.26
entry.content: a happy day with playing Killers of three kingdoms, it’s a wonderful game.

entry.title: Sept.25
entry.content: I pasted the eaxm.Now I will prepare for my CET-6 and spend more time on my ukelele.someone tell me if you want to paly it well,you should spend at least one year on finger picking.it’s a new change to me.moreover,I am trying to find a profession which I am interested in.I really don’t like my profession that I’ve learned in unniversity.Hope I can find my direction without lost.

entry.title: Sept.24
entry.content: I will regain my liberty,no matter what is the result !!! but at the same time,I realized I do something wrong.such as I put a lot of pressures on myself,I began to be pessimistic and I got a bit uptight so that I can’t put all my attention on learning.maybe I should go bed early to relax myself.Wish me can past the test.good nite.
